name: Tai Kamiya
effect: [Start of Your Turn] If you have 2 or less memory， set your memory to 3.[Your Turn] All of your red Digimon with 4 or more digivolution cards gain ＜Security Attack +1＞ (This Digimon checks 1 additional security card).
security_effect: [Security] Play this card without paying its memory cost.
